Articles.Content: Does anyone have a more private-ish server that I may play on? All the ones online are overly populated and confusing on the rules. I just want to explore and build! I'm very respectful and just like to play casually with others. So how about it?

Does anyone have a more private-ish server that I may play on? All the ones online are overly populated and confusing on the rules. I just want to explore and build! I'm very respectful and just like to play casually with others. So how about it?

There's a forum for that. I can tell you my brother's though, if you want me to PM you it.
I'm constantly looking for one like that... I tried to make one but failed horribly. If you find one, could you tell me?

I would like to make something on a server without the fear of someone destroying it.

Or stupid admins

There was this one tekkit server I played on a long time ago. It was based on making a business, and selling your goods.

There was one city, you had to buy a lot of land, once you did that it was own too you.

And that all there was too it, no pvp, no griefing (useless you went out of the city)

But one day the server just vanish, the forums where gone, everything was gone.

I would love to play on another server like this, but most people just care about pvp and raiding.

I used to own a friendly server like that, with good staff and regs, moderation against griefing and rudeness, etc...

But I shut it down. Maybe one day I'll start it again.
